mapper.sql: id, role, privilege, update_time, first_module, second_module, third_module, status, mark, parent_rpid, isParent, rpid, parentid
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from role_privilege
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into role_privilege (id, role, privilege, update_time, first_module, second_module, third_module, status, mark, parent_rpid, isParent, rpid, parentid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{firstModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentRpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isparent,jdbcType=BIT}, #{rpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update role_privilege
